import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./Shop.css"; import Header from "../header/Header"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ShopItem from "./ShopItem"; import { db } from "./firebase"; function Shop() { const [itemImg, setItemImg] = useState(""); const [itemName, setItemName] = useState(""); const [itemCost, setItemCost] = useState(""); const [itemViews, setItemViews] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { setItemImg( "https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/5d3703e2f1176b00089761a6/960x0.jpg?cropX1=836&cropX2=5396&cropY1=799&cropY2=3364" ); setItemName("Laptop"); setItemCost(500); setItemViews(200); }, []); return ( <>
